long_description: The Shimano Tiagra CS-4600 10-speed cassette provides a wide range of gears and durable construction for easy, lasting spinning. Hyperglide (HG) sprockets incorporate specifically positioned shift ramps and tooth profiles for improved shifting. Made of nickel-plated steel cogs for enhanced durability. Wide 12-30 tooth gear range for easy-spinning recreational riding; includes 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 21, 24, 27, 30-tooth cogs. Shimano Tiagra CS-4600 10-speed cassette is compatible with Super Narrow, 10-speed Shimano chains, sold separately.
short_description: The Shimano Tiagra CS-4600 10-speed cassette provides a wide range of gears and durable construction for easy, lasting spinning.
